headline: Citizens Reiterates a Market Perform Rating on Chubb Limited (CB), Keeps the PT
summary: Chubb Limited (NYSE:CB) is one of the Most Undervalued Long Term Stocks to Buy Right Now. On October 22, Citizens reiterated Chubb Limited (NYSE:CB) with a Market Perform rating and a $325 price target. ​The rating comes after the company released its fiscal third-quarter earnings on October 21. headline: Should You Reassess Chubb After Its 5.1% Weekly Surge in 2025?
summary: Trying to decide what to do with Chubb stock can feel like standing at a crossroads, especially if you’ve tracked its journey recently. Over just the past week, shares have posted an impressive 5.1% gain, bouncing back from a relatively flat showing over the past month. Year-to-date, the stock sits up 3.5%, with something of a rollercoaster one-year return at -0.8%. But peer back a bit further and the long-term story looks striking: Chubb boasts a remarkable 134.9% return over five years,...
